name: animate_logos_label_website_v2
description: This website belongs to the GitHub repository https://github.com/J4K08L4N63N84HN/animate_logos.git. It can be visited at https://animate-logos.web.app/. The website is based on a Google Firebase backend and used to rate SVG logo animations.  These ratings are then used as examples to train a model which learns to generate aesthetic animations for a given SVG logo.
